name: Fold Up!
description:
An exciting and addictive puzzle game----Fold Up is coming!
Just use your finger folding the blocks correctly to fill the space and complete each challenge.

There are many degrees can be challenged, such as Amateur, Skilled, Grand master, etc.
Currently, thousands of players are stuck on level 84(Veteran).
Exercise your brain and surpass them to get a higher degree!

How to play:
● Folding up, down, left or right the blocks to copy it.
● Try to fill all blank grids.

Features:
● Easy to operate: Just fold it!
● Simple yet exciting challenging puzzles for all ages!
● A great number of well-designed levels!
● Very textured wooden background!
● Stimulate your mental and Train your brain!
● Relaxation and Stress Relief!
● So entertaining and totally for free!
● Get a landscape picture after completing each degree!
● No time limits, take your time and play it leisurely!
● Free offline puzzle game, play anywhere!

Enjoying Fold Up? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kkzapgames/

Need Help? Have Questions?
Contact Fold Up Tech Support by sending an email to: service@m.teewee.games
